body: ### Caltrain railroad diagram If you too fell in love with the graphic timetables in Edward Tufte's "The Visual Display of Quantitative Information" (cover) or "Envisioning Information" (p24-25), you are in good company; Shamim Mohamed made one for the BART a few years ago, and I made this one for the Caltrain: Fork away!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: An iOS-app-to-be for drawing live railroad diagrams of your commute, akin to http://www.drones.com/bart.html
name: Railroad-diagrams
